authenticate¶

Authentication module.

Authentication module provide functions to authentication service of Fujitsu K5 cloud REST API
k5lib.authenticate.get_defaultproject_id(user, password, contract)¶

Get default project ID.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
Returns:

Domain default project ID if succesfull otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.authenticate.get_domain_id(user, password, contract)¶

Get domain ID.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
Returns:

Domain ID if succesfull otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.authenticate.get_global_token(user, password, contract)¶

Get token to authenticate global services.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
Returns:

Global token if succesfull otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.authenticate.get_project_id(user, password, contract, project_name, region)¶

Get ID for a project.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
  • project_name – K5 project name.
  • region – K5 region name.
Returns:

ID if succesfull. Otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.authenticate.get_project_info(user, password, contract, project_name, region)¶

Get information about a user.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
  • project_name – K5 project name.
  • region – K5 region name.
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.authenticate.get_project_token(user, password, contract, project_name, region)¶

Get token to authenticate on project.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
  • project_name – K5 project name.
  • region – K5 region name.
Returns:

Token scoped to project if succesfull. Otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.authenticate.get_region_info(user, password, contract, region)¶

Get region information.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
  • region – K5 region name.
Returns:

JSON if succesfully. Otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.authenticate.get_region_token(user, password, contract, region)¶

Get token to authenticate on region level services.

Parameters:
  • user – Valid K5 user.
  • password – Valid K5 password
  • contract – K5 domain name.
  • region – K5 region name.
Returns:

Token scoped to region if succesfully. Otherwise error from requests library.
